ability:
Charges herself up with electricity for 6 seconds. While electrified, she aims at the farthest enemy, her attacks pierce, and she dashes after every shot.
VIP Bonus: Electrified lasts until the end of combat.

TFT airborne/Pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, dealing 150/300/900 {} magic damage and TFT stun/stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Additionally his next basic attack TFT airborne/knocks up his target for 1 second. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

Shield herself for 225/325/850 {} and deals 175/250/600 {} magic damage to her target and enemies behind it.
On her second cast, she also dashes through her target.
On her third cast, she instead throws her target into the air and slams them back to the ground behind them, dealing 250/350/900 {} magic damage in a circle around her target.

Fires an orb in a line for 5 hexes, dealing 140/210/500 {} magic damage to all enemies it passes through on the way out and the way back. She fires 1/1/2 additional orbs for each time she casts in combat, enemies take 60% damage for each subsequent orb. The orbs are fired to form a circular arc with 10Â° between each orb.

Starts spinning his axe, causing his next basic attack to gain 120/150/400 {} {} '''bonus''' on-hit physical damage.
The spinning axe ricochets off the target high up into the air, landing 2 seconds later at '''Draven's''' current position. If '''Draven''' catches an axe, ''Spinning Axe'' is reapplied for no additional cost on his next basic attack.
'''Draven''' can hold up to two ''Spinning Axes'' in his hands at once.
VIP Bonus: Gains infinite attack range and ignores an additional 25% his target's armor.
Unleashes piercing bolts of eldritch power in a cone towards his target, dealing 250/350/500 {} magic damage to enemies within and healing 250/330/350 {} for each enemy hit.
Stretches his arms up to 3 hexes to pull the 2 most distant enemies towards him, dealing 300/450/700 {} magic damage. During this time he gains 60% damage reduction.
Dash/Dashes away from his current target and fires 2/2/3 shots at nearby enemies that each deal 170/260/295 {} magic damage.
Bites her target, dealing 100/150/200 (+ 125% AD) physical damage and healing for 200/225/400 {}. If she casts her ability again on a target she already bit, the heal is increased to 275/350/600 {}.
Fires a missile at his target that explodes on impact, dealing 180/220/290 {} magic damage to nearby enemies.
Spins towards the most enemies in a line dealing 70/90/110 {} (+ 100% AD) physical damage to enemies hit and empowering his next 3 basic attacks to deal 25% '''bonus''' damage.
For the next 5 seconds, grants herself 30/60/300% {} '''bonus''' attack speed and her attacks bounce up to 4 times within 5 hexes dealing 30% AD physical damage to enemies hit.

Transforms into Mega Gnar and throws a boulder at the farthest enemy within 3-hex range, dealing 150/200/300 (+ 175% AD) physical damage to all enemies it passes through.
While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar is TFT melee/melee, his ability is his boulder toss, and he gains 500/750/1200 {} health and his mana costs are reduced by 20.
Calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting all nearby allies 40/55/80% {} '''bonus''' attack speed for 5 seconds.

Charges at his target, TFT airborne/knocking them back for a short distance. Then he slams the ground, dealing 200/325/1200 {} magic damage and TFT stun/stunning all nearby enemies for 1.5/2/8 seconds.

Signals Bristle to charge, dealing 300/450/750 {} magic damage and TFT stun/stunning the target for 1.5/1.5/2 seconds. She then gains Frost Armor, granting her 50/75/125 '''bonus''' armor and '''bonus''' magic resistance for 4 seconds.

Slams his vault door into the ground, creating a fissure towards his target. Enemies within 2 hexes of him and those struck by the fissure are TFT stun/stunned for 2/2.75/8 seconds and take 100/200/750 {} magic damage.

Shields herself by 475/575/675 {} for 3 seconds. She then shackles herself to all enemies in a 2 hex radius, and deals 80/125/175 {} magic damage per second to them, as long as the shield holds.
If the shield expires without being broken, all targets are TFT Stun/stunned for a 1.5/2/2.5 seconds. If the shield is broken, she instead refunds herself 30 mana.
Fires a missile at his target, dealing 25/50/100 (+ 150% AD) physical damage. If the missile hits, he grants himself 18% {} '''bonus''' attack speed, stacking up to 90% {} at 5 stacks.
Hurls a bomb at his target. After a moderate delay, the bomb lands dealing 300/400/550 {} magic damage to the enemy in the epicenter, and half to adjacent enemies.

Transforms his weapon into a powerful sniper rifle for his next four shots. Each shot deals {} physical damage, reduced by 50% for each target they pierce through. The fourth shot is guaranteed to Crit/critically strike and deals key=%/type=target's '''missing''' health/0 to 100 for 11/0 to 100/key1=%/formula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health/color=health {} more damage.

Shields herself for 500/650/850 {} over 4 seconds. When the shield expires, it deals 100/135/175 {} magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes and 100/135/175 {} '''bonus''' damage if it wasn't destroyed. If it was destroyed, the ability becomes 15% stronger this combat. This effect can stack.

Melee - To the Skies!: Overcharges himself, becoming unstoppable and gaining a 375/550/3000 {} shield for 3 seconds. He then attacks twice, cleaving enemies in front of him for {} physical damage before leaping to the skies and slamming down on his target. Enemies within 2 hexes take the same damage and have their armor and magic resistance reduced by 50/50/70% for 5 seconds.
Ranged - Shock Blast: Summons an acceleration gate, granting allies within the same row 20/40/1000% {} '''bonus''' attack speed for 5 seconds. He then replaces his next 3 attacks with orbs of electricity that deal {} physical damage in an area around his target. The 3rd orb has an increased area of effect.

Flings the nearest enemy towards the farthest enemy, dealing 225/300/425 {} magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact and TFT stun/stunning the thrown target for 2/2.5/3 seconds.
VIP Bonus: Impact area is larger and TFT airborne/knocks up affected enemies for 1.5 seconds.

Devours his target, storing them in his belly and dealing 900/1350/30000 {} magic damage over 3 seconds. During this time, the target is invulnerable to other sources of damage and he gains 30% damage reduction. If they die while inside, he either spits out a random item component they were holding, or the cost of the unit in gold. Otherwise, he spits them towards the farthest enemy, briefly TFT stun/stunning targets they impact. If the target is immune to crowd control, they take 50% damage instead.

Infects the mind of the closest unafflicted target, dealing 650/900/1100 {} magic damage over 8 seconds and reduces their magic resistance by 40% for the duration. If an afflicted target dies, this ability spreads to the nearest 1/1/2 unafflicted targets with the remaining duration.
Summons vines in the row with the most enemies, dealing 275/375/575 {} magic damage and TFT stun/stunning them for 1.5/2/2.5 seconds.

Summons 3/4/12 singularities to fire death rays that cut across the battlefield in a line and melt enemy defenses. To enemies caught in its path, death rays deal 360/420/1500 {} magic damage and destroys 40/50/200% of any remaining shields.

Projects her song towards the largest group of units. The song deals 250/400/1200 {} magic damage to enemies. Allies it passes through are healed 250/350/1000 {} and gain 30/45/100% '''bonus''' attack speed for 4 seconds.

Places a bomb on the closest enemy, TFT stun/stunning them for 1.5 seconds. When the stun ends, or the target dies, the bomb explodes dealing 250/400/777 {} magic damage to adjacent enemies and reducing their attack speed by 30/40/50% for 4 seconds.
Dash/Dashes to her target, striking them for 75/100/550 {} (+ 190% AD) physical damage. If she kills the target, she Bladesurges again to the enemy with the lowest health.

Injects an unstable concoction into 1/1/5 of his lowest health allies, granting them 50% '''maximum''' health, 50/125/666% '''bonus''' attack speed, and immunity to crowd control for 6/7/10 seconds. When the concoction wears off, unstable units die by explosion, dealing 350/600/5000 {} magic damage to nearby enemies. The explosion radius is doubled at 3-Star.

Unleashes a toxic poison wave towards the largest group of nearby enemies within 6 hexes, poisoning all enemies caught in its path for 15 seconds. Poisoned enemies suffer 20% reduced attack speed and take 50/75/250 {} magic damage per second. Damage dealt by the poison can stack.
Sends Valor out at the target with the highest attack speed, dealing 200/300/650 {} magic damage to the target and nearby enemies. Enemies hit are also TFT disarm/disarmed for 1.5/2/2.5 seconds.

Calls down a beacon of light upon herself, granting herself a 400/650/1000 {} shield for 5/5/8 seconds. All allies within 2 hexes gain 30/50/80 '''bonus''' armor and '''bonus''' magic resistance for the same duration.
VIP Bonus: Heal {} every second for each unit targeting her.

Invokes an afterimage that bats a device towards the largest group of units. Upon landing, it deals 125/200/400 {} magic damage to enemies within and reduces their attack speed by 20/20/30% for 4 seconds. Allies inside gain 30/40/50% {} '''bonus''' attack speed/attack speed for 4 seconds.

Sends out her ball towards the largest group of champions, then commands it to release a shockwave. Allies within 2 hexes gain a 125/200/700 {} shield for 4 seconds, while enemies within the area are briefly TFT airborne/knocked up and dealt 300/425/1500 {} magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the ball are drawn in and TFT stun/stunned for 1/1/4 seconds.
Enlarges 1/2/3 low health allies, granting them 350/370/390 {} '''bonus''' health and TFT airborne/knocking up enemies near them. If the ally is already enlarged, they are healed instead.
